items.sentence: We may go to Australia next month to visit Tom.
I think that doing that would be inappropriate.
Tom gave me food as well as something to drink.
Tom got up and walked away, leaving Mary alone.
I wonder how many students are in Tom\'s class.
Tom is afraid something bad is going to happen.
I asked Tom some questions about his childhood.
I assume all our equipment is still up to date.
No matter what you say, I\'ll do it my own way.
My father wouldn\'t allow me to see my friends.
